Name: Cursed Book
Effect: at the end of your turn, reload to max, lose 5 hp for each ammo reloaded in this way. can't be removed.

Name: Sacred Book
Effect: at the end of your turn, reload 1 if you are not at max ammo. remaining: 25 Ammo.

Name: Amber
Effect: upgrade your deck at the start of the next 3 battles.

Name: Empty Bottle
Effect: get 2 Drunk at the start of the next 3 battles.

Name: Devil Deal
Effect: get gold if you defeat the current stage's boss
